Class Critter

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
          java.awt.Rectangle
              com.tdgame.Critter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Critter
extends java.awt.Rectangle

This class has functionality to draw and manage movement of critters on screen according to path saved in map array.

imgHeight - Sets critter image height
imgX - Adjusts position of criiter image
imgY - Adjusts position of critter image
rectX - Adjusts initial X position of rectangle which contains image of critter
rectY - Adjusts initial Y position of rectangle which contains image of critter
healthSpace - Adjusts Y position of health bar displayed over critter
